message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be fair to propose a price of $950000 for this exceptional item.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I'm willing to pay a premium for this product, but I need to make sure it's a good value for my money.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and are willing to negotiate further. Our counteroffer for the product is $900000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $875000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
We're glad you're willing to negotiate, Bob. Our latest proposal is to offer the product at $890000. We hope this aligns better with your budget.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but I'm not willing to go any higher. Can you consider this offer?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. We've carefully considered your request and are willing to accept $885000 for the product. This is our final offer.
I'm sorry, but I'm not willing to accept $885000. I'm willing to go up to $875000, but no higher. Can you reconsider?
We appreciate your continued interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to accept $880000 for the product. This is our final offer.
I'm sorry, but I'm not willing to accept $880000. I'm willing to walk away if I can't get a better deal. I'm willing to meet you at $870000, but no higher. Can you reconsider?
